ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.tools

Class PlusShapeCenterDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.tools.PlusShapeCenterDetector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FluorescenceTrajectoryTracker

    public class PlusShapeCenterDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests one point which can be considered as the center of the wing pouch and tries to optimize it.
    Version:
    October 16, 2011
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com)
